job_purpose: To develop new features for Ideagen products using Node.js, JavaScript, Vue.js, and other open-source technologies, ensuring high-quality solutions and contributing to the overall improvement of enterprise solutions.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Build new features for Ideagen products using Node.js, JavaScript, Vue.js, and other open-source technologies
Work closely with Development Managers, Product Owners, and cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise solutions
Partner with the Product Design Team to create seamless and user-friendly designs
Participate in Agile practices (e.g., Scrum), contributing to sprint backlogs and planned release cycles
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve software defects while ensuring high-quality solutions
Write unit tests to validate development work and ensure feature reliability
Contribute to team practices, technology decisions, and documentation
Perform tasks autonomously, applying sound judgment to achieve project goals
required_qualifications: At least 2 years’ experience in a Software Development role
Proven ability to deliver technical design within an enterprise application using Node.js and JavaScript
Demonstrable experience implementing Node.js programming best practices
Web application front-end development experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience using Source Control, preferably Git
Strong communication and presentation skills, both verbal and written, in English
Experience writing backend and front-end unit tests
Understanding of Agile software development methodologies/frameworks such as Scrum
Database development experience preferably in PostgreSQL
Knowledge using CI/CD tools specifically Jenkins, SonarQube, Docker, TeamCity, Octopus, Chef
company_details: Ideagen is a global company with offices worldwide, dedicated to providing software solutions that contribute to the safety and well-being of millions of people. They value work-life balance, flexibility, and inclusivity in their work environment.
